description: A towering, sharp-toothed anthropomorphic robot stands menacingly in the corner of a room, next to a cuckoo clock. On the opposite wall hangs a framed picture of bananas and grapes. A small tabby cat is crouched low to the floor, intently focused on something near the base of the robot's foot. The cat's predatory attention is directed at a domestic-scale target despite the overwhelming, surreal presence of the gigantic robot. This scene presents an absurd contrast between a cosmic-level threat and the mundane activities of a house pet.
